StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDEPAndHoldDetailReport]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RS_ORGID int AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @OrgType varchar(4)
SELECT @OrgType = ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @RS_ORGID
DECLARE @RS_ORG TABLE (ORG_ID INT)
IF @OrgType = 'RSS' BEGIN INSERT INTO @RS_ORG (ORG_ID) SELECT PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @RS_ORGID END
IF @OrgType = 'RS' BEGIN --- INSERT THE RS ID INTO THE TABLE INSERT INTO @RS_ORG (ORG_ID) VALUES (@RS_ORGID) END
IF @OrgType = 'D' BEGIN --- INSERT THE RSs THAT BELONG TO THE DISTRICT INTO THE TABLE INSERT INTO @RS_ORG (ORG_ID) SELECT DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.DBO.ORGANIZATION_MAP DIST WHERE DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @RS_ORGID END
IF @OrgType = 'R' BEGIN --- INSERT THE RSs THAT BELONG TO THE REGION INTO THE TABLE INSERT INTO @RS_ORG (ORG_ID) SELECT DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.DBO.ORGANIZATION_MAP REG INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.ORGANIZATION_MAP DIST ON (REG.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @RS_ORGID AND REG.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID) END
IF @OrgType = 'H' BEGIN --- INSERT ALL RSs INTO THE TABLE INSERT INTO @RS_ORG (ORG_ID) SELECT RS.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RS WHERE RS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' END
SELECT NWA.NWA_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, rs.[NAME] AS RS, rss.[NAME] AS RSS, MI.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, MI.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, BQ.ID as BIQ_ID FROM dbo.MIContract MI INNER JOIN dbo.NWA NWA ON MI.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID INNER JOIN dbo.PERSON P ON NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN [USMC].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] vw ON NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = vw.root INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION rs ON vw.RS = rs.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION rss ON NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = rss.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN @RS_ORG rsOrg ON rs.ORGANIZATION_ID = rsOrg.ORG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.BIQ_QUESTIONNAIRE BQ ON P.PERSON_ID = BQ.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN mcriss.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON NWA.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM mcriss.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS CS2 WHERE CS2.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID) AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'E' AND CS.STATUS_CODE = 'A' AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'DH' WHERE CONTRACTED_IN_MCRISS = 0 and CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE is not null Order by MI.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE
